title: Structuring information with mental models: a tour of Boston
proctitle: CHI '96: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: Ishantha Lokuge
authors.institution: MIT Media Lab, 20 Ames Street, Cambridge, MA

authors.name: Stephen A. Gilbert
authors.institution: Department of Brain & Cognitive Sciences, MIT, E10-120, Cambridge, MA

authors.name: Whitman Richards
authors.institution: MIT, Media Lab, 20 Ames Street, Cambridge, MA

references.text: Anderson, J. A. Spreading activation theory of memory. Journal of Learning and Verbal Behavior 22, 261-295, 1983. <sag_upar.gif>

Johnson-Laird, P.N. Mental models. Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1983. <sag_upar.gif>
